data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy J7 Prime ~ Android 7.0 Nougat
data.actual_result: It does appear and when clicking on it will give you an empty profile that closes shortly afterwards
data.expected_result: It shouldn't appear as Clyde isn't actually a user nor a bot
data.short_description: Accessing Clyde's profile via message popup is possible and leads to an empty profile that closes shortly afterwards
data.steps_to_repro: - Get a message from Clyde to appear, this can be done by for example messaging someone who doesn't share a server with you - Hold on Clyde's message - Notice there's a profile option
